name: NSDraggingItem
desc: A single dragged item within a dragging session.

items.name: init(pasteboardWriter: NSPasteboardWriting)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a dragging item using the specified content.

items.name: func setDraggingFrame(NSRect, contents: Any?)
items.desc: Sets the itemâ€™s dragging frame and contents.

items.name: var draggingFrame: NSRect
items.desc: Returns the frame of the dragging item.

items.name: var imageComponents: [NSDraggingImageComponent]?
items.desc: Returns an array of dragging image components that are used to create the drag image.

items.name: var imageComponentsProvider: (() -> [NSDraggingImageComponent])?
items.desc: An array of blocks that provide the dragging image components.

items.name: var item: Any
items.desc: Returns the pasteboard reader or writer object dependent on the context of where this dragging item is used .
